MVAddFamilyStep4JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Did you know on average, an uncomplicated childbirth can cost nearly $11,000.","description":"Healthcare becomes increasingly important when you are adding to your family. MVAddFamilyStep7JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Establish an Emergency Fund","description":"An emergency fund is more important than ever as your family grows.","marginBottom":"25px"},{"id":"image","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/family/step7.svg","marginBottom":"0px","altText":""},{"pageElements":[{"backgroundColor":"var(--secondary-colors-voya-teal)","elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Be Prepared","description":"video{Watch a video} about how to get started so you can have more control over your finances if you were faced with the unexpected.","textColor":"var(--primary-colors-voya-white)","linkColor":"var(--primary-colors-voya-white)","playerIds":["kaltura_player_1644444036"],"videoUrls":["https://cdnapisec.kaltura.com/p/1234081/sp/123408100/embedIframeJs/uiconf_id/48794683/partner_id/1234081?iframeembed=true&playerId=kaltura_player_1644444036&entry_id=1_2lal2x6r"],"marginBottom":"0px"}]}]},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default"}]}]}

MVAddFamilyStep3JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Reevaluate your Workplace Benefits","marginBottom":"0px"},{"id":"intro","header":"Things to think about","description":"Adding a child to your family will qualify you to make changes to your benefits outside of open enrollment."},{"id":"image","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/family/step3.svg","marginBottom":"0px","altText":""},{"pageElements":[{"backgroundColor":"var(--secondary-colors-voya-teal)","elements":[{"id":"intro","descriptions":["Visit myHealth&Wealth to understand your healthcare options and understand costs","Here's a webview{quick read} on the different types of healthcare coverage ","Once your child joins your family, you'll need to add them to your healthcare plan within 30 days"],"webviewLinks":["https://www.voya.com/article/how-choose-health-insurance-policy"],"linkColor":"var(--primary-colors-voya-white)","textColor":"var(--primary-colors-voya-white)","marginBottom":"0px","listMargin":"5px"}]}]},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default"}]}]}
